means.word_mean: 1. cosmopolitan tropical herb or subshrub with yellow flowers and slender curved pods; a weed; sometimes placed in genus Cassia
2. North American rock cress having very long curved pods

baesInfo.translate_result: sickled用镰刀割…（sickle的过去式与过去分词形式）
